snippet: WALDSHAN--Carole Sue (nee Krochmal). January 26, 1938 - March 10, 2016. Daughter of the late Yetta and Mac Krochmal and sister of the late Howard Krochmal. The heartbroken family of Carole Sue Waldshan best known as "Gammy" mourns the loss of our greatest treasure. She was the shining, golden, loving light and heart of our family. Throughout our lives, whether adversity or Simcha, she was right beside us, sharing and making it better. Carole was a force of love, warmth, humor and brilliance; a true gift to her friends and all those who knew her. She expressed to each of us, "You are the light of my life," but in fact, she was the light of ours. She is survived by her loving and devoted husband, Stanley, her children, Richard, Susan, Randi, Stan and Cindy and adored grandchildren, Matthew, Hannah, Alix, Molly, Sarah and Julia. Funeral services will be held at Gutterman's in Woodbury, NY at 1:00pm on Wednesday, March 16th. 1/3
